title: Linux uuname Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux uuname command and learn how to retrieve system information, combine it with other commands, and apply practical examples to enhance your Linux administration skills.

meta.title: Linux uuname Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux uuname command and learn how to retrieve system information, combine it with other commands, and apply practical examples to enhance your Linux administration skills.
meta.keywords: Linux, uuname, system information, networking, communication, command line, system administration

verify.name: Verify uuname command version
verify.hint: Ensure that the installed version of the uuname command is 4.15.2.

verify.name: Verify uuname output
verify.hint: Ensure that the output of the `uuname -a` command contains the system name "ubuntu", the release "22.04", and the machine hardware name "x86_64".

steps.title: Combine uuname with Other Linux Commands

verify.name: Verify uuname with grep
verify.hint: Ensure that the output of `uuname -a | grep "Ubuntu 22.04"` contains the expected text.

verify.name: Verify uuname with awk
verify.hint: Ensure that the output of `uuname -a | awk '{print $1, $3}'` is "ubuntu 22.04".
